title: To get a glimpse of a gas cylinder...
body_lines: A long queue of people are seen in the picture at Parliament Road Pelawatte to buy gas yesterday. The people complained that they are not even aware of the new price of a gas cylinder. Some people said they had to wait in the queues for several days and take turns to buy gas but could not get at least a glimpse of it, despite the long languish. Pix by Kithsiri De Mel.
